title: System element process - Business rules
content:
The system element workflow relies on a simple business rule that applies to these phases:

  • In Use
  • Ended
Event Condition Service Management action
After change If Missing = true
  • Add a comment to the record that the system element is missing.
  • Send an email to the Owner that the system element is missing.

Related topics

  • System elements
  • System element workflow
